about_the_game:
Backrooms Exploration Liminal

Dive into a retro liminal space, adventure. Explore the enigmatic Backrooms, freely navigate eerie corridors, and unveil secrets of this liminal realm through immersive storytelling. Experience haunting gameplay with atmospheric audio, and captivating scenery!

Backrooms Exploration Liminal Unique Features! -


· Explore 9 Main Backrooms Levels + Hidden Levels...

· Adventure through the backrooms alone

· Explore the Backrooms Freely with no restraints!

· As lore accurate as possible

· VHS Camera, Body Camera, and Default Camera Option for three unique and different feelings!

Backrooms Exploration Liminal Story

In this haunting Backrooms exploration game, you awaken to find yourself trapped in a mysterious and transitory dimension known as the Backrooms. As you venture through the endless corridors and rooms, you uncover fragments of a forgotten past and encounter unsettling entities that lurk within the shadows. Guided only by whispers and cryptic messages, you embark on a journey to unravel the enigma of this liminal realm.

The story unfolds through immersive storytelling, where every room holds secrets and clues that piece together a larger narrative. Delve deeper into the unsettling depths of the Backrooms, unearthing the truth behind its existence and your own connection to this surreal world. Will you find a way to escape or succumb to the disorienting madness that permeates every corner? The answers lie within the eerie ambiance, atmospheric audio, and immersive retro aesthetics that shape your journey through the Backrooms.

name: Backrooms Exploration Liminal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
